argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpinvcl.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpinvcl.2 | |- N = ( inv ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` G ) = ( GId ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_grpoinvval | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( iota_ y e. X ( y G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 3 | #P_grpoinveu | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> E! y e. X ( y G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_riotacl | |- ( E! y e. X ( y G A ) = ( GId ` G ) -> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) e. X ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( iota_ y e. X ( y G A ) = ( GId ` G ) ) e. X ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) e. X ) |
